--- title: This is a page where I want to see all the things subtitle: Testing my css changes date: 2025/08/28 categories: [test, r, python, data science, analytics] reading-time: true include-in-header: - text: | --- Data science is a [multidisciplinary field that](https://wikipedia.com) combines statistical analysis, machine learning, and domain expertise to extract meaningful insights from data. By leveraging tools like Python, R, and SQL, data scientists can clean, process, and analyze large datasets to uncover patterns and trends. These insights are often used to drive decision-making in industries ranging from healthcare to finance. As the volume of data continues to grow, the importance of data visualization and storytelling becomes paramount, enabling stakeholders to understand complex findings and take actionable steps. Trying again. üç∫ ```{{python}} (resp.iloc[:, [2] + list(range(4, 13))] .fillna('No answer') .melt(id_vars="How do you describe yourself?", var_name="choice", value_name="answer") .drop(['choice'],axis=1) .dropna() .groupby("How do you describe yourself?", as_index=False) .value_counts() >> ggplot(aes("answer", "count", fill = "How do you describe yourself?")) + geom_bar(stat="identity", position=position_dodge(preserve = 'single')) #+ facet_wrap("How do you describe yourself?") + coord_flip() + scale_x_discrete(limits=answer_order) + theme(plot_title=element_text(ha="left"), axis_title_x = element_blank(), axis_title_y = element_blank()) + labs(title = "Q4: Were or are you interested in a promotion?", subtitle="Pick all statements that apply") )#.save("plots/q4.png", dpi="320") ``` # This is an H1 title Product analytics involves tracking and analyzing user interactions with a product to understand behavior, improve user experience, and drive business growth. By leveraging tools like event tracking and cohort analysis, companies can identify trends, optimize features, and make data-driven decisions to enhance product performance. ## This is an H2 title ggplot is a powerful data visualization library in R that allows users to create complex and aesthetically pleasing plots using a layered grammar of graphics. It supports a wide range of plot types and customization options, making it a popular choice for data analysis and storytelling. ### This is an H3 title Plotnine is a Python data visualization library based on the grammar of graphics, similar to ggplot2 in R. It provides a high-level interface for creating complex and customizable plots with ease. #### This is an H4 title Causal inference is the process of determining cause-and-effect relationships from data, often using statistical and computational methods. It plays a critical role in fields like healthcare, economics, and social sciences to inform decision-making and policy development. ##### This is an H5 title A/B testing is a method of comparing two versions of a webpage or app to determine which one performs better. By randomly assigning users to different versions, businesses can analyze metrics like click-through rates or conversions to make data-driven decisions. ###### This is an H6 title Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) are measurable values that help organizations track progress toward specific objectives. They provide actionable insights by quantifying performance across various business areas, enabling data-driven decision-making.
